data.eml:eml: Review of Hydrometra gracilenta Horváth, 1899 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) in Italy, with notes on its general distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cianferoni, Fabio, Dell’Olmo, Lorella, Lastrucci, Lorenzo (2015): Review of Hydrometra gracilenta Horváth, 1899 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Hydrometridae) in Italy, with notes on its general distribution. Zootaxa 3980 (4): 584-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3980.4.8
